meta.title: Battery Solutions for Experience Agencies | Humble
meta.description: Silent battery power for brand activations and experiential events. Professional power solutions tailored to your activation needs.

hero.title: Power Immersive Experiences Anywhere
hero.description: No refueling. No noise. More power than a 7000 watt generator. 60A silent power for brand activations, pop-ups, and installations. No permits, no noise complaints, no limits.

items.title: Get Approved for Impossible Locations
items.description: Hotels, rooftops, retail spaces, historic buildings. Silent operation means yes from venues that always say no to generators.

items.title: Protect the Brand Experience
items.description: Your activation isn't competing with generator noise. Guests hear the music, the message, the momentâ€”not a diesel engine.

items.title: Deploy Faster, Wrap Faster
items.description: Under 5 minutes to power on. No fuel logistics, no fire watch, no generator babysitting. Your crew focuses on the experience, not the power.

items.title: Silent Approval
items.description: Zero emissions, zero noise. Indoor-approved power opens previously impossible venues. Say yes to rooftop activations, hotel ballrooms, historic buildings, and retail spaces that prohibit generators.

items.title: True Cost Savings
items.description: Cost-competitive with generators once you factor in permits, fuel, fire watch, and crew time. Transparent rental pricing includes delivery, pickup, and backup generator.

items.title: White-Glove Service
items.description: Humble handles delivery, placement, and pickup. You don't touch it. Your crew focuses on creating experiences, not managing power logistics.

items.title: Real Power
items.description: 60A Bates out plus three 20A Edison circuits. Power full AV rigs, theatrical lighting, interactive elements, and charging stations simultaneously.
